MongoAdmin - Interface in org.eclipselabs.emongo
 
MongoDatabaseLocator - Class in org.eclipselabs.emongo.junit.util
This class is intended to be used as a JUnit @Rule.
MongoDatabaseLocator() - Constructor for class org.eclipselabs.emongo.junit.util.MongoDatabaseLocator
Connects to the "junit" database on localhost:27017
MongoDatabaseLocator(String) - Constructor for class org.eclipselabs.emongo.junit.util.MongoDatabaseLocator
Connects to the specified database on localhost:27017 and defaults to dropping the database before each test
MongoDatabaseLocator(String, String) - Constructor for class org.eclipselabs.emongo.junit.util.MongoDatabaseLocator
Connects to the specified database on the specified host using the default port 27017 and defaults to dropping the database before each test
MongoDatabaseLocator(String, int, String, String) - Constructor for class org.eclipselabs.emongo.junit.util.MongoDatabaseLocator
Connects to the specified database on the specified host and port and defaults to dropping the database before each test
MongoDatabaseLocator(String, int, String, String, boolean, boolean) - Constructor for class org.eclipselabs.emongo.junit.util.MongoDatabaseLocator
Connects to the specified database on the specified host and port
MongoIdFactory - Interface in org.eclipselabs.emongo
A MongoIdFactory provides the equivalent of an auto-increment primary key.
MongoProvider - Interface in org.eclipselabs.emongo
This OSGi service provides access to a configured MongoDB driver.
MongoServerStatsPublisher - Interface in org.eclipselabs.emongo
 
MONITOR_PID - Static variable in interface org.eclipselabs.emongo.MongoAdmin
